purpleculture_pinyin:
zhèng
Zheng state during the Warring States period; surname Zheng; abbr. for 郑州
Государство Чжэн в период Воюющих царств; фамилия Чжэн; сокр. для 郑州

(Simplified: 郑)

purpleculture_examples:
鄭州 [ zhèng zhōu ]: Zhengzhou prefecture level city and capital of Henan Province in central China
鄭重 [ zhèng zhòng ]: serious; solemn
鄭重其事 [ zhèng zhòng qí shì ]: serious about the matter

heisig_chinese_memo: A St. Bernard balances a bottle of horned whiskey on his nose to get it over the city walls as a courtesy to his exiled master Zheng.
Ru_trainchinese: zhèng: (сущ) Чжэн (фамилия); Чжэн (вассальное царство во времена династии Чжоу)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the decision (奠) of the group (⻏) was made in the ancient Chinese province
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The monk Mr. Zheng sits outside the city walls guarding the golden calf.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from " dian " from " yi ", " dian " is sound symbol. Or from " town " from " Guo " or " Yong " in classical " 𩫖 ", " Yap ", " Guo ", " Yong " There are cities, the walls intended. In the early Western Zhou Dynasty, the inscription " Zheng " was only written as " Dian ", and the symbol " Yi " was paid attention to later. " Zheng " was the name of the country during the Spring and Autumn Period and Warring States Period. The country's surname was Ji, and I became Shuding: "Yu Zhengbang's property, less mother and father." It means that I was born in Zheng State and left my parents since I was a child.

"Said Wen": "Zheng, Jingzhao County. It was awarded by Prince Zhou Li. From the town to the sound. The extinction of Zong Zhou, Zheng Yuli, now Xinzheng is also."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " yi ", " mo " sound. " Zheng " is the name of the country, that is, the state of Zheng in the Spring and Autumn Period and Warring States Period.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「奠」從「邑」，「奠」是聲符。或不從「邑」而從「郭」或「墉」的古文「𩫖」，「邑」、「郭」、「墉」有城邑、城牆之意。西周早期金文「鄭」只寫作「奠」，後期才加注意符「邑」。「鄭」是春秋戰國時期的國名，國姓是姬，哀成叔鼎：「余鄭邦之產，少去母父。」意思是說我在鄭國出生，自小便離開父母。

　　《說文》：「鄭，京兆縣。周厲王子友所封。从邑奠聲。宗周之滅，鄭徙潧洧之上，今新鄭是也。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「邑」，「奠」聲。「鄭」是國名，即春秋戰國時之鄭國。

" Zheng" was the name of the country during the Spring and Autumn Period and Warring States Period. The country's surname was Ji, and I became Shuding: "Yu Zhengbang's property, less mother and father." It means that I was born in Zheng State and left my parents since I was a child. 鄭字的基本解释

鄭
zhèng
见“郑”。

鄭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèng］
［《廣韻》直正切，去勁，澄。］
“郑1”的繁体字。
(1)古国名。春秋国名。姬姓。本周西都畿内地，周宣王封弟友于此。在今陕西华县西北。
(2)古国名。隋末，王世充自立为王，国号郑，都洛阳，后为唐所灭。
(3)指春秋郑国民间歌乐。
(4)引申为淫靡。
(5)见“鄭重”。
(6)姓。

鄭字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄭； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1277第30
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?直正切，音㽀。國名。【釋名】鄭，町也，地多平町町然也。【正字通】鄭本西都畿內地，周宣王封其弟友，是爲鄭。桓公寄孥與賄于虢鄶，其子武公，定平王于東都，因徙其封，施舊號于新邑，是爲新鄭。今河南開封府鄭州是也。　又南鄭，縣名。今屬陝西漢中府，桓公封邑在畿內，爲西鄭，漢中在京兆之南，故稱南鄭以別之。【一統志】南鄭，古褒國附庸之邑。桓公歿，其民南奔居此，因曰南鄭。　又【廣韻】鄭重，殷勤之意。【前漢·王莽傳】非皇天所以鄭重降符命之意。　又姓。【集韻】鄭滅于韓，子孫因以國爲氏。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhèng］
["Guangyun" is straight and tangent, go strong, and clear. ]
Traditional characters for "郑1".
(1) Ancient country name. The name of the Spring and Autumn Period. Ji's surname. This week, the western capital is in the hinterland of Guizhou, where Zhou Xuan Wang will be his brother and friend. In today's northwest of Hua County, Shaanxi.
(2) Ancient country name. At the end of the Sui Dynasty, Wang Shichong proclaimed himself the king, the state name Zheng, the capital of Luoyang, and later was destroyed by the Tang.
(3) Refers to the Chunqiu Zheng folk song and music.
(4) The extension is lewdness.
(5) See "Solemnly".
(6) Last name.
Zheng
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　 Zheng; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1277 30
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Straight and tangent, sound 㽀. Country names. [Release name] Zheng, Dingya, Ditaping Ding Ranya. [Zhengzitong] Zheng Benxi was in the interior of Guizhou, and Zhou Xuan Wang named his brother and friend as Zheng. Huangong sent children and bribed Yuguying. His son Wugong, King Dingping was in the eastern capital. Because of his relocation, he gave the old title to Xinyi, which is Xinzheng. This is also the case of Zhengzhou, Kaifeng Prefecture, Henan Province.　You Nanzheng, the name of the county. Today it belongs to Hanzhong Mansion, Shaanxi. Huangong was named Xizheng in Guinei, and Hanzhong was in the south of Jingzhao, so it was called Nanzheng. [Universal History] Nanzheng, the vassal town of the ancient country. Huan Gong died, and his people went south to live here, because they called Nan Zheng.　[Guang Yun] solemnly and diligently. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] It was not the emperor, so it meant to solemnly drop the fate.　Another last name. [Jiyun] Zheng died out of Han, and his descendants took the country as their clan.
